name: Curried chicken salad
ingredients:
1. 3 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, halved lengthwise
2. 1/2 cup mayonnaise
3. 1 tbsp lemon zest
4. 1 tbsp lemon juice
5. 1 1/2 tsp curry powder
6. 1/4 tsp salt
7. 2 ripe mangoes, diced
8. 1/4 cup dried cranberries
9. 2 green onions, thinly sliced
10. 1 celery stalk, finely chopped
11. 6 leaves Boston lettuce
12. 6 English muffins, toasted
steps:
1. ARRANGE chicken in a single layer in a large pot.
2. Add water to just cover.
3. Bring to a boil over medium-high.
4. Flip chicken, reduce heat to medium and simmer until cooked, about 6 more min.
5. Cool.
6. STIR mayo with lemon zest, juice, curry and salt in large bowl.
7. Using 2 forks, shred chicken, then stir into mayo mixture with mango, cranberries, green onions and celery.
8. Divide among muffins with lettuce leaves
9. Sandwich with tops
